vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
θέλω,
see at {ἐθέλω} and add ὅστις ἂν θέλῃ [Refs]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to will, decide, want to; wish, desire
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to will, decide, want to; wish, desire
to exercise the will, properly by an unimpassioned operation; to be willing, wish Mt. 17:4; to be inclined, disposed, Rom. 13:3; to choose, decide Lk. 1:62; to intend, design, Lk. 14:28; to will, Jn. 5:21; 21:22; ἤθελον, I could wish, Gal. 4:20
vocabInfos._es_Definition: desear, querer ; tener la voluntad ; tener la intención (MAR.6:48; ROM.1:13 ) ; presagiar (HCH.2:12; HCH.17:20)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
